directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onions, mushrooms, and garlic; cook and stir until onions soften, about 5 minutes. Add asparagus, wine, thyme, and black pepper; cook and stir until asparagus is tender, about 5 minutes. Pour in 2 cups broth. Simmer soup until flavors combine, 5 to 10 minutes.
Puree soup with an immersion blender until smooth. Stir in cream. Thin soup with remaining stock to desired consistency and simmer until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped mushrooms, or to taste
1 teaspoon minced garlic, or to taste
1 bunch asparagus, trimmed and coarsely chopped
2 dashes dried thyme, or more to taste
3 cups vegetable broth, or more to taste
title: Cream of Thyme Asparagus Soup
